# propensity and IPTW by weightit

```{r}
ip.iptw = ip.id %>%
  left_join(ip.sexage) %>%
  filter(!is.na(Sex) | !is.na(age)) %>%
  left_join(ip.sdi) %>%
  filter(!is.na(sdi_q)) %>%
  left_join(ip.drug.all) %>%
  left_join(ip.diag)

ip.iptw = ip.iptw %>% 
  # left join paxlovid
  left_join(ip.paxlovid) %>% 
  # impute paxlovid without 4d rule
  # impute paxlovid with 4d rule
  mutate(paxlovidlong = ifelse(!is.na(daystillpaxlovid), 1, 0),
         paxlovidshort = ifelse(daystillpaxlovid <= 4, 1, 0)) %>%
  # left join molnupiravir
  left_join(ip.molnupiravir) %>%
  # impute molnupiravir without 4d rule
  # impute molnupiravir with 4d rule
  mutate(molnupiravirlong = ifelse(!is.na(daystillmolnupiravir), 1, 0),
         molnupiravirshort = ifelse(daystillmolnupiravir <= 4, 1, 0)) 

# subset factors
x_factors_tableone = colnames(ip.iptw)
x_factors_tableone = x_factors_tableone[!x_factors_tableone %in% c("Reference Key","HN Number",
                                        "Admission Date (yyyy-mm-dd)","Discharge Date (yyyy-mm-dd)",
                                        "age_grp5", "dexamethasone", "baricitinib", "parkinsons", "district")]
x_factors_tableone = x_factors_tableone[!grepl("paxlovid|molnupiravir", x_factors_tableone)]
x_factors = x_factors_tableone[x_factors_tableone != "age"]

# trt_factors = c("paxlovid","molnupiravir")

# # check if there is any NA, missing data
# ip.iptw %>% filter(across(c("Sex"), is.na))

ip.iptw = ip.iptw %>%
  mutate(across(c(x_factors), ~replace_na(., 0)),
         across(c(x_factors) & !"age", factor)) 

# check if there is any NA, missing data
ip.iptw %>% filter(across(x_factors, is.na))
```

# 2 cohorts

```{r}
ip.iptw.p = ip.iptw %>%
  # remove all molnupiravir
  filter(molnupiravirlong != 1) %>%
  # remove all taken paxlovid only after 4d since admission
  filter(!(paxlovidlong == 1 & paxlovidshort != 1)) %>%
  mutate(paxlovid = ifelse(is.na(paxlovidshort), 0, 1)) %>%
  select(-contains("long"), -contains("short"), -contains("days"))

# iptw

weights.p = iptw_tableone(df = ip.iptw.p, 
              treatment = "paxlovid",
              x_factors = x_factors,
              x_factors_tableone = x_factors_tableone,
              path_of_unweighted_tableone = "./p.unweighted.tableone.xlsx",
              path_of_weighted_tableone = "./p.weighted.tableone.xlsx")

ip.iptw.p = ip.iptw.p %>%
  mutate(weight = weights.p$weights)

writexl::write_xlsx(ip.iptw.p, "./ip.iptw.p.nooutcome.xlsx")

# ---------
# molnupiravir

ip.iptw.m = ip.iptw %>%
  # remove all paxlovid
  filter(paxlovidlong != 1) %>%
  # remove all taken molnupiravir only after 4d since admission
  filter(!(molnupiravirlong == 1 & molnupiravirshort != 1))%>%
  mutate(molnupiravir = ifelse(is.na(molnupiravirshort), 0, 1))%>%
  select(-contains("long"), -contains("short"), -contains("days"))

weights.m = iptw_tableone(df = ip.iptw.m, 
              treatment = "molnupiravir",
              x_factors = x_factors,
              x_factors_tableone = x_factors_tableone,
              path_of_unweighted_tableone = "./m.unweighted.tableone.xlsx",
              path_of_weighted_tableone = "./m.weighted.tableone.xlsx")

ip.iptw.m = ip.iptw.m %>%
  mutate(weight = weights.m$weights)

print(ip.tab1.p, smd = T)
```

# HR mortality


```{r}
x_factors_hr = c("Sex", "age_grp5", "sdi_q", "diabetes", "cancer")
# x_factors_hr2 = c("Sex", "age_grp3", "sdi_q", "diabetes", "cancer")
```

```{r}
# paxlovid
ip.iptw.p.mortality = ip.iptw.p  %>%
  left_join(ip.death, by = 'Reference Key') %>%
  # replace NA
  mutate(across(!"daystillevent", ~replace_na(., 0)),
         # factorise everything
         across(!"daystillevent" & !"age" & !"weight", factor))

writexl::write_xlsx(ip.iptw.p.mortality, "./ip.iptw.p.mortality.xlsx")

for(event in c("death28d", "resp_death")){
  hr.death = c()
  hr.death = iptw_hr_tidy(df = ip.iptw.p.mortality,
                          x_factors = x_factors_hr,
                          event = event,
                          daystillevent = "daystillevent",
                          treatment = "paxlovid")
  hr.death
  writexl::write_xlsx(hr.death, path = paste0("./results/hr.", event, ".agr_grp5.p.xlsx"))
}

# molnupiravir

ip.iptw.m.mortality = ip.iptw.m  %>%
  left_join(ip.death, by = 'Reference Key') %>%
  # replace NA
  mutate(across(!"daystillevent", ~replace_na(., 0)),
         # factorise everything
         across(!"daystillevent" & !"age" & !"weight", factor))

writexl::write_xlsx(ip.iptw.p.mortality, "./ip.iptw.p.mortality.xlsx")

for(event in c("death28d", "resp_death")){
  hr.death = c()
  hr.death = iptw_hr_tidy(df = ip.iptw.m.mortality,
                          x_factors = x_factors_hr,
                          event = event,
                          daystillevent = "daystillevent",
                          treatment = "paxlovid")
  hr.death
  writexl::write_xlsx(hr.death, path = paste0("./results/hr.", event, ".agr_grp5.m.xlsx"))
}
```

# KM approx

```{r}
#KM curve : count time from day 0 
survfit(Surv(time = daystillevent,event = as.numeric(death28d))~ paxlovid,  
        weights = weights.p$weights, 
        data = ip.iptw.p.mortality, 
        ctype = 2)-> s_original
summary(s_original)

# KM plot
autoplot(s_original)

# fit the Cox model_original 
coxph(Surv(time =daystillevent, event = as.numeric(death28d))~ paxlovid , 
      weights = weights.p$weights, 
      data = ip.iptw.p.mortality, 
      id = `Reference Key`)-> Coxph_model_paxlovid_original
# exp(coef)== 0.1913

autoplot(Coxph_model_paxlovid_original)

# test the model if the proportionality assumption holds
cox.zph(Coxph_model_paxlovid_original)-> Test1
Test1
```

# HR organ dysfunction
# paxlovid

```{r}
ip.iptw.p.organ_dys.orig = ip.iptw.p %>%
    left_join(organ_dys) %>%
  # each organ dysfuntion col becomes days till event info
    mutate(across("Circulatory.shock":"Acute.liver.impairment", 
                  ~ifelse(!is.na(.), 
                         ymd(.) - ymd(`Admission Date (yyyy-mm-dd)`),
                         NA)),
           # left-censor as NA for event == 0
           across("Circulatory.shock":"Acute.liver.impairment", 
                  ~ifelse(. < 0, NA, .)),
           # right-censor as NA for event == 0 imputation
           across("Circulatory.shock":"Acute.liver.impairment", 
                  ~ifelse(. > 21, NA, .)),
           ) 

writexl::write_xlsx(ip.iptw.p.organ_dys.orig, path = "./ip.iptw.p.organ_dys.orig.xlsx")

# writexl::write_xlsx(ip.iptw.p.organ_dys, "./ip.iptw.p.organ_dys.xlsx")
hr.organ_dys.p = c()
for(daystillevent in c("Circulatory.shock","Respiratory.failure","Acute.kidney.injury","Coagulopathy","Acute.liver.impairment")){
  
  print(daystillevent)
  # daystillevent = "Circulatory.shock"
  ip.iptw.p.organ_dys = ip.iptw.p.organ_dys.orig %>% 
    mutate(
           # invalid (beyond study period) or no -> event = 0
           event = ifelse(!is.na(!!sym(daystillevent)), 1, 0),
           # impute daystillevent NA as event = 0
           event = ifelse(is.na(!!sym(daystillevent)), 0, event),
           
           )
  # replace the daystillevent column, aka organ dysfunction column NA (event == 0) with 21d
  ip.iptw.p.organ_dys[[daystillevent]] = ifelse(is.na(ip.iptw.p.organ_dys[[daystillevent]]),
                                                21,
                                                ip.iptw.p.organ_dys[[daystillevent]])
  hr.small = iptw_hr_tidy(df = ip.iptw.p.organ_dys,
                          x_factors = x_factors_hr,
                          event = "event",
                          daystillevent = daystillevent,
                          treatment = "paxlovid") %>%
    mutate(event = daystillevent)
  hr.organ_dys.p = bind_rows(hr.organ_dys.p, hr.small)
  
}
writexl::write_xlsx(hr.organ_dys.p, path = "./results/hr/hr.organ_dys.agr_grp5.p.xlsx")
```

# event/risk table

```{r}
tab1.organ_dys = c()
remove_brackets_helper = function(x){gsub("\\s*\\([^\\)]+\\)", "", x)}
for(eventtype in c("Circulatory.shock","Respiratory.failure",
                   "Acute.kidney.injury","Coagulopathy","Acute.liver.impairment")){
  print(eventtype)
  tab1.organ_dys.small = 
    ip.iptw.p.organ_dys.orig %>%
      select(x_factors_hr, paxlovid, eventtype) %>%
      mutate(event = ifelse(!is.na(!!as.name(eventtype)), 1, 0),
             across(everything(), factor)) %>%
      CreateTableOne(vars = x_factors_hr,
                     data = .,
                     strata = c("paxlovid", "event"),
                   test = F,
                   smd = F)
  tab1.organ_dys.small <- print(tab1.organ_dys.small, quote = FALSE, 
                               noSpaces = TRUE, printToggle = FALSE, 
                               smd = F, showAllLevels = T)
  tab1.organ_dys.small = as.data.frame(cbind("variables" = rownames(tab1.organ_dys.small),tab1.organ_dys.small))
  # remove row names
  rownames(tab1.organ_dys.small) = NULL 
  
  tab1.organ_dys.small = tab1.organ_dys.small %>% 
    # remove brackets
    mutate(across(everything(), remove_brackets_helper),
           across("0:0":"1:1", as.numeric)) %>%
    # add organ dysfunction type header info
    add_row(variables = eventtype, .before = 1) %>%
    # make event/risk cols
    mutate("paxlovid.user" = paste(`1:1`, "/", `1:1` + `1:0`),
           "paxlovid.nonuser" = paste(`0:1`, "/", `0:1` + `0:0`)) %>%
    # discard strata info
    select(-("0:0":"1:1"))
  tab1.organ_dys = bind_rows(tab1.organ_dys, tab1.organ_dys.small)
  
}
## Save to a xlsx
writexl::write_xlsx(tab1.organ_dys, path = "./results/event_risk.organ_dys.xlsx")
# tab1.organ_dys

```

# 0-60 circulatory shock drug use and comorbs analysis

```{r}
CreateTableOne(
  data = ip.iptw.p.organ_dys.orig %>% 
  filter(age_grp5 == "(0,60]") %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Circulatory.shock)) %>% 
  select(age, antiplatelets:paxlovid), 
  strata = "paxlovid")
ip.iptw.p.organ_dys.orig %>% 
  filter(age_grp5 == "(0,60]") %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Circulatory.shock), paxlovid == 1) %>% 
  select(daystillpaxlovid, Circulatory.shock)
fit = coxph(Surv(Circulatory.shock, event) ~ paxlovid,
            data = ip.iptw.p.organ_dys.orig %>% 
  filter(age_grp5 == "(0,60]") %>%
    mutate( # invalid (beyond study period) or no -> event = 0
           event = ifelse(!is.na(!!sym(daystillevent)), 1, 0),
           # impute daystillevent NA as event = 0
           event = ifelse(is.na(!!sym(daystillevent)), 0, event)
           ),
  weights = weight
  )
test = cox.zph(fit)
print(test)
```
